text: Burton F. "Burt" Natarus (November 7, 1933 â€“ June 5, 2020) was an American politician. He was an Alderman of the 42nd Ward of Chicago from 1971 to 2007. Natarus was born in Wausau, Wisconsin. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Natarus died on June 5, 2020 in Chicago, aged 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chicago City Council members Category:American political scientists Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Writers from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Wisconsin Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Wausau, Wisconsin
title: Burton Natarus
